00019 BusIfInterfaceMonitor::BusIfInterfaceMonitor(BusInterface* busif, 
00020                                                                                          BusIfGeneralTab* generalTab,
00021                                                                                          LibraryInterface* libHandler,
00022                                                                                          QWidget *parent): 
00023 BusIfInterfaceModeEditor(busif, parent),
00024 generalTab_(generalTab),
00025 libHandler_(libHandler),
00026 interfaceMode_(this),
00027 systemGroup_(this) {
00028 
00029         // set up the items for interface mode combo box
00030         interfaceMode_.addItem(QString("master"));  // index = 0
00031         interfaceMode_.addItem(QString("slave"));       // index = 1
00032         interfaceMode_.addItem(QString("system"));      // index = 2
00033         interfaceMode_.addItem(QString("mirroredSlave"));       // index = 3
00034         interfaceMode_.addItem(QString("mirroredMaster"));      // index = 4
00035         interfaceMode_.addItem(QString("mirroredSystem"));      // index = 5
00036 
00037         connect(&interfaceMode_, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
00038                 this, SLOT(onInterfaceModeChange(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00039 
00040         // set up the layout of the GUI items
00041         QFormLayout* interfaceLayout = new QFormLayout();
00042         interfaceLayout->addRow(tr("Interface mode"), &interfaceMode_);
00043 
00044         QFormLayout* groupLayout = new QFormLayout();
00045         groupLayout->addRow(tr("Group"), &systemGroup_);
00046 
00047         QVBoxLayout* topLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00048         topLayout->addLayout(interfaceLayout);
00049         topLayout->addLayout(groupLayout);
00050 
00051         restoreChanges();
00052 }
00053 
00054 BusIfInterfaceMonitor::~BusIfInterfaceMonitor() {
00055 }
00056 
00057 bool BusIfInterfaceMonitor::isValid() const {
00058         
00059         // if no interface mode is not defined
00060         if (interfaceMode_.currentText().isEmpty())
00061                 return false;
00062 
00063         // if interface mode is system or mirrored system but group is not defined
00064         else if ((interfaceMode_.currentIndex() == 2 ||
00065                 interfaceMode_.currentIndex() == 5) && 
00066                 (systemGroup_.currentText().isEmpty()))
00067                 return false;
00068 
00069         // all ok
00070         return true;
00071 }
00072 
00073 void BusIfInterfaceMonitor::restoreChanges() {
00074         
00075         updateDisplay();
00076 
00077         int groupIndex = -1;
00078         int interfaceIndex = -1;
00079         // select the value specified in the monitor element
00080         if (busIf()->getMonitor()) {
00081                 
00082                 // get the index to be selected for system group
00083                 groupIndex = systemGroup_.findText(busIf()->getMonitor()->group_);
00084 
00085                 // get the index to be selected for interface mode
00086                 interfaceIndex = interfaceMode_.findText(General::interfaceMode2Str(
00087                         busIf()->getMonitor()->interfaceMode_));
00088 
00089         }
00090         
00091         systemGroup_.setCurrentIndex(groupIndex);
00092         interfaceMode_.setCurrentIndex(interfaceIndex);
00093 
00094         onInterfaceModeChange(interfaceIndex);
00095 }
00096 
00097 void BusIfInterfaceMonitor::applyChanges() {
00098 
00099         busIf()->setInterfaceMode(General::MONITOR);
00100         busIf()->getMonitor()->interfaceMode_ = General::str2Interfacemode(
00101                 interfaceMode_.currentText(), General::SYSTEM);
00102 
00103         // set the right value for monitor's group-element
00104         switch (interfaceMode_.currentIndex()) {
00105                 // if selected interface mode is system or mirrored system
00106                 case 2:
00107                 case 5: {
00108                         busIf()->getMonitor()->group_ = systemGroup_.currentText();
00109                         return;
00110                                 }
00111                                 // if interface mode is not system or mirrored system then disable the
00112                                 // combo box
00113                 default: {
00114                         busIf()->getMonitor()->group_ = QString();
00115                         return;
00116                                  }
00117         }
00118 }
00119 
00120 void BusIfInterfaceMonitor::onInterfaceModeChange( int index ) {
00121 
00122         // if selected interface mode is system or mirrored system then enable
00123         // the system group combo box
00124         switch (index) {
00125                 case 2:
00126                 case 5: {
00127                         systemGroup_.setEnabled(true);
00128                         return;
00129                                 }
00130                 // if interface mode is not system or mirrored system then disable the
00131                 // combo box
00132                 default: {
00133                         systemGroup_.setDisabled(true);
00134                         return;
00135                                  }
00136         }
00137 }
00138 
00139 void BusIfInterfaceMonitor::updateDisplay() {
00140 
00141         // the text that was selected
00142         QString oldText = systemGroup_.currentText();
00143 
00144         systemGroup_.clear();
00145 
00146         VLNV busDefVLNV = generalTab_->getBusType();
00147         if (!busDefVLNV.isValid())
00148                 return;
00149 
00150         if (!libHandler_->contains(busDefVLNV)) {
00151                 emit errorMessage(tr("The selected bus type does not exist in library."));
00152                 return;
00153         }
00154 
00155         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComb = libHandler_->getModel(busDefVLNV);
00156 
00157         // if library did not contain given bus definition
00158         if (!libComb) {
00159                 emit errorMessage(tr("No Bus Definition with given VLNV was found."));
00160                 return;
00161         }
00162 
00163         // if the library component with given vlnv was not a bus definition
00164         else if (libComb->getVlnv()->getType() != VLNV::BUSDEFINITION) {
00165                 emit errorMessage(tr("Bus type VLNV was wrong type"));
00166                 return;
00167         }
00168 
00169         QSharedPointer<BusDefinition> busDef = libComb.staticCast<BusDefinition>();
00170         QStringList groupList = busDef->getSystemGroupNames();
00171 
00172         // add the system names to the list
00173         systemGroup_.addItems(groupList);
00174 
00175         // select the same text that was previously selected if it still can be found
00176         int index = systemGroup_.findText(oldText);
00177         systemGroup_.setCurrentIndex(index);
00178 }
00179 
00180 General::InterfaceMode BusIfInterfaceMonitor::getInterfaceMode() const {
00181         return General::MONITOR;
00182 }
